LanguageData.Yokai_TuskSprit.label: Kiba no Seirei
LanguageData.Yokai_TuskSprit.description: Brittle, tiny, and seemingly useless, these tusk spirits can make a discerning colony wealthy beyond imagination. \nFeed and protect these little lumps for 4 years, and the fang of a dragon-far rarer than a Thrumbo horn-can be twisted, wretched, and butchered from their lifeless frames.
LanguageData.Yokai_TuskSprit.tools.0.label: Body attack
LanguageData.Yokai_TuskSprit_Corpse.label: Kiba no Seirei corpse
